items.name: __zlcmid
items.purpose: Stores a unique ID to identify the user's session. Statistics.

items.name: _ga
items.purpose: Stores a version number and a unique ID for the user's browser for tracking with Google Analytics. Statistics.

items.name: _gat_gtag_UA_*
items.purpose: Stores a random string value used to limit user requests. Statistics.

items.name: _gid
items.purpose: Stores a unique ID to distinguish each user with Google Analytics. Statistics.

items.name: _hjAbsoluteSessionInProgress
items.purpose: Stores a true/false value for Hotjar to identify the user's first page view. Statistics.

items.name: _hjFirstSeen
items.purpose: Stores a true/false value for Hotjar to determine whether it's seeing the user for the first time. Statistics.

items.name: _hjIncludedInPageviewSample
items.purpose: Stores a true/false value for Hotjar to determine whether to include the user's data in the data sampling defined by the site's daily page view limit. Statistics.

items.name: _hjIncludedInSessionSample
items.purpose: Stores a true/false value for Hotjar to determine whether to include the user's data in the data sampling defined by the site's daily session limit. Statistics.

items.name: _hjSession
items.purpose: Stores session data for Hotjar so requests in the session window are attributes to the same session. Statistics.

items.name: _hjSessionUser
items.purpose: Stores the user's Hotjar user ID so Hotjar can track the user's behavior. Statistics.

items.name: ac_client_batch
items.purpose: Stores a list of the session's event IDs to avoid sending duplicate events to Analytics Cloud. Statistics.

items.name: ac_client_channel_id
items.purpose: Stores the current site's Channel ID to send to Analytics Cloud. Statistics.

items.name: ac_client_context
items.purpose: Stores a list of page and user properties to send to Analytics Cloud so event analysis has the necessary context. Statistics.

items.name: ac_client_identity
items.purpose: Stores the current user's Analytics Cloud SHA-256 hashed user ID combined with email so users with accounts can be tracked by Analytics Cloud as known individuals. Statistics.

items.name: ac_client_previous_email_address_hash
items.purpose: Stores the last known user's SHA-256 hashed email ID to match with the current user to assign events from current session's anonymous browsing to this user. Statistics.

items.name: ac_client_storage_version
items.purpose: Stores the current version of internal storage settings so the locally stored data structure can be compatible with the current version of the browser. Statistics.

items.name: ac_client_user_id
items.purpose: Stores the current user's Analytics Cloud user ID to track and segment guest users as anonymous individuals. Statistics.

items.name: ac_message_queue
items.purpose: Stores an array of events to send to Analytics Cloud when possible. Statistics.

items.name: ac_message_queue_identity
items.purpose: Stores an array of identities to send to Analytics Cloud when possible. Statistics.
